channel.title: GDPR on JobRunr
channel.description: Recent content in GDPR on JobRunr

item.title: GDPR compliancy - hide sensitive Job data to prying eyes
item.description: OpenID Connect is an authentication protocol that allows to verify the identity of users and obtain their profile information. JobRunr Pro allows you to use your existing OpenID Provider to secure your JobRunr Pro Dashboard and its underlying REST API by using OpenIdConnectAuthenticationProvider. This authentication provider is perfect for enterprise grade access control. In this guide, we’ll first configure JobRunr to use an OpenID Provider and we’ll use Keycloak as our identity provider throughout this guide.
